movies.title: L'âge des ténèbres
movies.plot: Jean-Marc is a man without qualities living in times that are out of joint. His wife and children ignore him; he's a mid-level civil servant in Montreal doing his job without care. He has an active imagination of sexual conquest, but his only real feelings come when he visits his aged mother, whose health is failing. When his wife leaves abruptly to work in Toronto, Jean-Marc sets out to reorder things with his daughters, his social life, and at work. In a world that at best is a farce, does he stand a chance?
movies.simplePlot: Jean-Marc Leblanc (Labrèche), a desperate civil servant, escapes reality as we all know it, to imagine himself as the hero in imaginary adventures.

biography.bio: Marc Labrèche was born on November 20, 1960 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. He is an actor and director, known for Le coeur a ses raisons (2005), L'âge des ténèbres (2007) and Whitewash (2013). He was previously married to Fabienne Dor.
biography.name: Marc Labrèche

biography.bio: Diane Kruger was born Diane Heidkrüger in Algermissen, near Hildesheim, Germany, to Maria-Theresa, a bank employee, and Hans-Heinrich Heidkrüger, a computer specialist. She studied ballet with the Royal Ballet in London before an injury ended her career. She returned to Germany and became a top fashion model. She later pursued acting and relocated to Paris at the suggestion of filmmaker Luc Besson (The Fifth Element (1997)). She married French actor Guillaume Canet (The Beach (2000)) in 2001.
biography.name: Diane Kruger

biography.bio: Sylvie Léonard was born on July 17, 1955. She is an actress and writer, known for Un gars, une fille (1997), Andrija i Andjelka (2015) and S' agapo - M' agapas (2000).
biography.name: Sylvie Léonard

biography.bio: Caroline Néron was born on July 21, 1973 in Boucherville, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for L'âge des ténèbres (2007), 3 saisons (2009) and Eternal (2004).
biography.name: Caroline Néron

biography.bio: Rufus Wainwright was born on July 22, 1973 in Rhinebeck, New York, USA as Rufus McGarrigle Wainwright. He has been married to Jörn Weisbrodt since August 23, 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Rufus Wainwright

biography.bio: Emma de Caunes was born on September 9, 1976 in Paris, France. She is an actress and director, known for The Science of Sleep (2006), Mr. Bean's Holiday (2007) and The Diving Bell and the Butterfly (2007). She has been married to Jamie Hewlett since September 10, 2011. She was previously married to Sinclair.
biography.name: Emma de Caunes

biography.bio: Macha Grenon was born on June 7, 1968 in Canada. She is an actress, known for Le monde de Barney (2010), The Barbarian Invasions (2003) and Familia (2005).
biography.name: Macha Grenon

biography.bio: Françoise Graton was born on June 4, 1930 in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. She was an actress, known for L'âge des ténèbres (2007), This Is My Father (1998) and The Great Land of Small (1986). She was married to Gilles Pelletier. She died on November 8, 2014 in Montréal, Québec, Canada.
biography.name: Françoise Graton

biography.bio: Rosalie Julien is an actress, known for L'âge des ténèbres (2007), Au nom de la loi (2005) and Enragés (2015).
biography.name: Rosalie Julien

biography.bio: Camille Léonard Rioux is an actress and writer, known for L'âge des ténèbres (2007), Pogo, vengeance et propagande (2016) and Un gars, une fille (1997).
biography.name: Camille Léonard Rioux

biography.bio: Didier Lucien is an actor, known for Dans une galaxie près de chez vous (1999), Pure Laine (2006) and Dans une galaxie près de chez vous - Le film (2004).
biography.name: Didier Lucien

biography.bio: Kimberly St-Pierre King is an actress, known for L'âge des ténèbres (2007), Aurore (2005) and Dans une galaxie près de chez vous - Le film (2004).
biography.name: Kimberly St-Pierre King

biography.bio: André Robitaille was born on October 3, 1963 in Sainte-Catherine-de-la-Jacques-Cartier, Quebec, Canada. He is an actor and writer, known for Monsieur Lazhar (2011), Bon Cop Bad Cop (2006) and L'âge des ténèbres (2007).
biography.name: André Robitaille

biography.bio: Pierre Curzi was born on February 11, 1946. He is an actor and writer, known for The Barbarian Invasions (2003), The Decline of the American Empire (1986) and Il était une fois des gens heureux... Les Plouffe (1981). He is married to Marie Tifo.
biography.name: Pierre Curzi

biography.bio: In 1969, with other actors, she refused her diploma from the Ecole nationale du theatre in protest against the institution and for the creative improvisation by the actors. With Pierre Curzi, Gilbert Sicotte and others she formed `le Grand cirque ordinaire', a theatre company devoted to improvisation. On the screen, she plays in some 'Denis Arcand' movies such as Réjeanne Padovani (1973) and for 'Anne Claire Poirier' before directing her first short in 1975 Anastasie oh ma cherie. But it is La cuisine rouge in 1979 about the revolt of women against their macho friend in a party which is seen as a stepping stone for "women in cinema". She went back to acting for Léa Pool and Claude Jutra, directing only one feature, a TV movie in 1991. Her next big screen release came in 1993: Le sexe des étoiles (1993) on the relation between a daughter and a father who had a sex change.
biography.name: Paule Baillargeon
